extendedInfo.description: Save Time and Money with the Piggly Wiggly App. Works with all Piggly Wiggly stores in WI and IL.The Piggly Wiggly App delivers Weekly Specials in real time from your home store to your fingertips.  Create your shopping list wherever you are by using your Android to shop sale items from Piggly Wiggly. Easily browse hundreds of items instantly. Your list will be neatly organized into categories with real time pictures, descriptions and prices. This application downloads the specials directly to your Android.  You can even synchronize with your Piggly Wiggly shopping list from www.shopthepig.comFeatures:- Real time pricing updated automatically- Simple navigation- View products to build a list quickly & browse specials- Pre-loaded product photos make it easy to find items on the shelf- Your items are automatically put in categories for easy in-store use- Offline list access â shop in store with your list and check off items as you place them in your cart- Customize your settings to see all the specials in your local store- Synchronize between your shopping list on your device and your shopping list on shopthepig.com- Add any items with the text option- Use your current location or search by zip code or city, state combination to find the closest Piggly Wiggly store- Email your list, and task someone else to do the shopping for you!

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Thanks Piggly Wiggly!  Just made shopping a whole lot easier. Should have known, since you were the first true grocery store! Keep it going!  :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: Completed registering, then when I was going to choose a store, app says yikes can\'t find location. Please fix, I shop here all the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wish ...
reviews.comment: Wish we could check our Pig Points balances.  Start up screen with pig image stays on screen way to long before getting to main screen.  Otherwise, great app!
reviews.author: Stacy Livernash

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Not sure why so many 1 star reviews.  No comments on any of them...  This is a handy app that does what you would want from a grocery store app.  It does require you to register with Piggly Wiggly, but if you are downloading this, then you\'ve probably already registered with the site.  After registering, you can assign a store as the store you shop at and you get the weekly specials for that store.  You can then easily and quickly add the items to a shopping list.  Anything not in the weekly advertisement you have to add manually to the list which is probably the only negative.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Way to save
reviews.comment: Easy way to save. Go thru the add and it creates my shopping list. First tjme used it saved 30 bucks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: Great idea and a good start however it would be helpful if special items told customers what the limit was for certain deals. For instance, 3 six pack sodas for $9.99; can we buy multiples? So if I got 6 six packs would that get me each at 9.99?? Its little things like that which would make this app superb. Both for customers and employees- I can see this app being used to help people around the store.
reviews.author: Nessi M.

reviews.comment: I love this app. I just wish it would add up the total. For example one total for food items and one for other items and then the total of both togeth
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t access
reviews.comment: Need a card to register to use app but my local store don\'t give out cards. The manager told me they give the ad deals to everyone, not just card holders, which is great but you can\'t access this app without a card.
reviews.author: E pl

reviews.title: Good design
reviews.comment: Has a good design element. However to using the battery too much cant tell what it\'s doing. It\'s a very useful but I have to remove it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
reviews.comment: Grocery shopping is fun now! Thanks Piggly Wiggly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Garbage.
reviews.comment: Try to enter the store location and all I get is yikes, can\'t connect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not really usable
reviews.comment: Can view one category before it says it can\'t display another.  Makes it useless.
reviews.author: Nic Hitchins

reviews.title: Cannot register without key card number!
reviews.comment: I like a lot of people I know don\'t carry my card I always just give them my phone number at the register. Please change this app to be able to register with phone number that\'s associated with the card . thank you
reviews.author: sharon yolton

reviews.title: Piggly Wiggly shopper
reviews.comment: niceapp, needs navigation button updates to return to previous menus, could also use swype left swype right to switch between group lists
reviews.author: Tenold Kusch

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: The one thing it should do is a scannable loyalty card, nope!
reviews.author: Addison Pettis

reviews.title: Won\'t connect
reviews.comment: I am really excited to start using this app when it gets fixed. Until then...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy 3
reviews.comment: Mine still does NOT work
reviews.author: shannon marksman

reviews.title: No dates
reviews.comment: Would be nice to know how long the price on sale items is good for...
reviews.author: Katie Abts

reviews.comment: Excited to use this. Simple, does what I want it to do.
reviews.author: Thomas Marks

reviews.title: Can not connect
reviews.comment: I installed this app twice will not work is it cause I allready had a account on the website wtf
reviews.author: A Google User
